name: BATTLETECH
description: Install the Windows GOG version of Battletech. This might be necessary if you want to install some mod which is not supported on the Linux version, such as Roguetech.
notes: The game does not exit properly. You will need to kill BattleTech.exe manually when you are done.

task.description: Please wait while the game installs. This might take a long time.
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Select the BATTLETECH setup file
game:
  arch: win64
  args: -force-driver-type-warp
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/BATTLETECH/BattleTech.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /LANG=en /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /VERYSILENT
    description: Please wait while the game installs. This might take a long time.
    executable: goginstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
wine:
  dxvk: true
